title: Skyborn: Climate Data Analysis Toolkit
description:
Skyborn is a comprehensive Python library for atmospheric and climate science data analysis, featuring high-performance Fortran/Cython implementations with OpenMP/SIMD optimization.

Core capabilities include:

  • Atmospheric circulation analysis: windspharm (spherical harmonics, streamfunction/velocity potential, Rossby wave analysis) and geostrophic wind calculations.
  • Tropical cyclone dynamics: Genesis Potential Index (GPI), potential intensity calculations based on Emanuel's thermodynamic theory.
  • Statistical trend analysis: Mann-Kendall test, Spearman/Kendall/Pearson correlations with xarray integration.
  • Tropopause height: Calculations following WMO standards.
  • Data interpolation: gridfill Poisson solver, CMIP6 regridding, RCM-to-point/grid transformations.
  • Emergent constraints: Methods for climate sensitivity analysis.
  • Visualization: Advanced scientific visualization tools.

Designed for processing multi-dimensional climate model outputs and reanalysis datasets with automatic dimension detection and metadata preservation.
